title: Natchez National Historical Park: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes      MelroseAdmission: Free for grounds and outbuildings; no park entrance feeGuided House Tour Fee: (cash or check only)    $10.00 for adults ages 18 to 61     $5.00 for seniors ages 62 and older - U.S. citizens only     $5.00 for children ages 6 to 17     Children under 6 years of age are free.  Passes: America the Beautiful - National Parks and Federal Recreational Land Passes are for sale at the Melrose site.  However these passes do not discount the house tour fee.Fee Free Days:  In 2016 the National Park Service will offer 16 fee-free days:  They are:January 18:  Martin Luther King Jr. DayApril 16-24: National Park WeekAugust 25-28: National Park Service's 100th Birthday WeekSeptember 24: National Public Lands DayNovember 11: Veterans Day The William Johnson HouseAdmission: Free
